title: [Placements] Deloitte interview shortlist - not recieved
content: When will deloitte send the shortlist for tomorrow's interview - why have things slowed down suddenly , such last min mails they send now

comments.body: Some people have received mails from hirepro saying that they have been shortlisted for the next round. They also asked for a photo and latest version of your resume.
What I thought this was going to be a face 2 face interview , wonâ€™t they send a csv file which has all the names short listed for each profile?
They have sent the shortlist now
Isnâ€™t that only for 5 roles what about the rest any idea?
What roles have they sent the short list for?
Usi AI oracle n all but not all 10
Did hirepro send it or the placement cell?
Hi, did anyone get the HirePro registration link for ADM role, or is it only for some roles?
